answers.answer: They probably don't think it is an issue. If you have a good relationship with your doctor and they know you're pregnant and have high blood pressure but don't feel the need to induce you it probably isn't reason for concern.

My doctor s u c k s s s :/ she doesn't talk to me much she just asks baby moving alright ? That's all and when she hears heartbeat she listens doesn't talk and says all good and she's done she's sweet but she doesn't connect with me I have to ask and I literally just get a very brief short response and half way answered like everything is "Normal" I want to hear more than just normal I like my midwives better they talk to me and comfort me and make me feel secure

question: So I keep reading posts here about other moms being induce due to high blood pressure, I have high blood pressure almost every time I go to the doctor and I also have gestational diabetes how come I'm not being induce now ? I just got told if my baby is not here by her due date they will induce me due to gestational diabetes
title: Concerned
